description:
Gyokutei Shinjin has rescued Yozen in exchange for his life. But Yozen`s body is weak due to Ohtenkun`s paopei attack, so Taikobo takes him back to Konron Mountain. The enraged Twelve Sennin swear revenge, but Taikobo suggests they split into small teams to infiltrate Kingo Island. At the same time, the Buseioh and Tenka are secretly infiltrating Kingo Island themselves, but they find themselves caught in Fukojin, the paopei of Totenkun. Meanwhile, Taikobo learns that the only way to save Yozen is to defeat Ohtenkun...
Source: crunchyroll
